title: Animal Telepathy - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/27/21
itunes:title: Animal Telepathy - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/27/21
description:
George Noory and energy healer Lori Spagna explore her work communicating with animals, the special bonds that exist between pets and their owners, and the spiritual role that animals play to raise us to a level of higher consciousness.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
